title: OG Habibti Please hat red
description: This is part of the original cotton habibti please hat series that people love, red has sold out during three runs.

title: OG habibti please hat teal
description: This is part of the original cotton habibti please hat series that people love, only three teals have been made and sell right away.

title: og habibti please hat navy
description: This is part of the original cotton habibti please hat series that people love, navy was part of one of the first runs and sold out.

title: OG Habibti Please hat black
description: This is the cream of the crop hat, first designed and created during COVID it is a fan favorite with the colours pulled off the habibti please podcast logo - inspired by a shisha lounge sign.

title: Og habibti please blue
description: This is part of the original cotton habibti please hat series at first an experimental color with yellow thread people love this combo now.

title: pick a colour
description: Have a colour flow you would like but don’t see? Please let me know your ideas! WE love to get creative.

title: Habibti Please Camping hat
description: This is a high quality cotton hat with side buttons, perfect for your next adventure featuring the original logo.

title: Two Tone statement hat
description: This is the two tone statement hat for those who want to shout habibti please at the top of their lungs!

title: Habibti please corduroy
description: The habibti please 2025 hat logo on contrasting complimentary corduroy.

title: Habibti Please running hat - 2 way colour flow
description: Perfect for visibility on a bike, on a run, on a walk - this panelled hat is very light.

title: example of a custom habibti please colour flow
description: The habibti please 2025 hat logo on a brown acid wash cotton cap.

title: habibti please five panelquickdry hat
description: The very popular five panel hat - note the colour flow is red, navy, green, and cream. This hat is perfect for outdoor activities and just hopping around town.

title: Habibti Please Hand printed totes - OG
description: Popular classic tote - this print has also exhibited, every piece is handprinted so there might be imperfections as part of process. Every canvas tote has a zipper.

title: Hats on display
description: get creative! have fun displaying the range of hats.

title: Habibti Please Shirts and sweaters
description: Habibti please hand printed sweaters and shirts.

title: example of a custom habibti please colour flow with symbol
description: This quick dry five panel habibti please hat features a moroccan teapot aka a berrad. Do you have a symbol you want on a hat? Please do ask

description: Have an idea? ask away! I have done a handful of customs and collaborations

title: Allah’s Favorite OG Camo - Pink font
description:
Popular classic tote - the white on black is more difficult to print and requires more ink, this print has also exhibited, every piece is handprinted so there might be imperfections as part of process. Every canvas tote has a zipper.

Please note these are hand printed and as a result there may be slight differences or “imperfections” between prints.
